channel.title: vue on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in vue on Joost Plattel

item.title: Nolostcapital
item.description: For Nolostcapital I build a tool that lets them put out questionnaires for specific goals towards well-being and HR. The tool offers direct insights from all the results from those questionnaires, enabling organizations to quickly act. The backend service was done in python & Django and the front-end in Vue.

item.title: Fundsup
item.description: To enable target marketing towards startups and investors alike, I helped Fundsup create a single database for campaigns and meta-data for their platform. The main technology of this stack was python & Django for the backend and the API and Vue for the front-end. The database was PostGres with JSON fields allowing for querying non-schema based fields.
